mapper.select: SELECT userIdx, roleCode, userId, userPwd, userName, postCode, userAddr1, userAddr2, etc, userTel, userEmail, userCreated_date, userModify_date, TO_CHAR(userBirth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') userBirth, blackCount FROM tb_user WHERE userIdx=#{userIdx}
SELECT userPwd FROM tb_user WHERE userIdx=#{userIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET userPwd=#{userPwd}, userEmail=#{userEmail}, userTel=#{userTel}, postCode=#{postCode}, userAddr1=#{userAddr1}, userAddr2=#{userAddr2}, etc=#{etc}, usermodify_date=sysdate WHERE userIdx=#{userIdx}
UPDATE tb_user SET enabled=0 WHERE userIdx=#{userIdx}
